function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor hygiene habits leading to illness and health issues","Impact":"Increased risk of illness and health issues","Mitigation":"Promoting good hygiene practices, education on personal hygiene","Technologies":"Sanitization technology, hygiene monitoring systems","People":"General population, individuals with poor hygiene habits","Owner":"Health organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Implementing proper hygiene protocols, ventilation systems, sanitization of common areas","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, touchless fixtures","People":"Building occupants, visitors, employees","Owner":"Building management, facility operators, public health officials"},{"Description":"Inadequate design of built environment affecting immune system","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to diseases and pandemics","Mitigation":"Incorporating design elements for better air quality, natural light, and ventilation","Technologies":"Building automation systems, green building materials, air purification systems","People":"Occupants of buildings, design professionals","Owner":"Architects, building owners, facility managers"}]}
